summary: REQ-13 appears implemented in TryDemoSection.tsx: the section wrapper uses a neutral background (bg-background) with flat borders, and green-accent-heavy styling is reduced via muted icon colors and muted panels. The demo URL/link target+rel behavior is preserved, and no gradients/glows are introduced. Two ancillary metadata/state files were also modified, which were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state tracking (project_state.json) even though the request was limited to styling changes in TryDemoSection.tsx.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies applying changes specifically in frontend/src/components/TryDemoSection.tsx and lists non-goals around other changes; updating project state metadata is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added descriptive entry for TryDemoSection in a frontend file summaries artifact.
hallucinated_features.reason: frontend-file-summaries.txt changes are not part of the requested styling implementation and are outside the explicitly named target file.
